textBeforeTable: Recent topics in "Sacred Animal Spirit Guides" join to post Then again....it doesn't have to "mean" anything. Power animals come to you in a shamanic journey as a way to indicate your powers and inner resources at your disposal. Sun, September 28, 2008 - 10:34 AM Re: slug 4 Wolf... join to post If this is inaccurate, then other hypotheses are welcome :) If this is correct, its ok to relax on the couch for hours. The body/mind needs a period of repose as well as activity. The common phrase 'being a slug' or sluggish means 'lazy'. If it came to you, my thoughts are that you may be an individual prone to overactivity and its presence in your shamanic journey
